etymology.description: 巾(巾) (jīn, "cloth") + phonetic: 邦(邦) (bāng, "country") = assisting with cloth or materials -> to help
etymology.interpretation: The character 幫 combines the meaning of 巾(巾) (jīn, "cloth") with the phonetic element 邦(邦) (bāng, "country"), symbolizing assistance or help with physical materials like cloth. This reflects the role of providing tangible support.
etymology.simplification: In the simplified form 帮, 巾(巾) (jīn, "cloth") is retained while 邦(邦) (bāng, "country") is kept intact from the traditional representation, aligning with historical simplification practices from 1956.

examples.chinese: 他帮老师(他幫老師)，辅导学生(輔導學生)。
examples.english: He helps the teacher, tutoring the students.

examples.chinese: 遇到困难时(遇到困難時)，朋友会帮忙(朋友會幫忙)。
examples.pinyin: Yùdào kùnnán shí, péngyǒu huì bāngmáng.
examples.english: When encountering difficulties, friends will help.
